amendment.description: To provide funding for the Carter Center's Guinea Worm Eradication Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2011 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2011 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S13367; text: CR S13367) To provide funding for the Carter Center's Guinea Worm Eradication Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2011 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2011 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Inouye.
